controlinterface.iface

Class AbstractControlInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • controlinterface.iface.AbstractControlInterface
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ControlInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConsoleControlInterface, SimpleLoggerControlInterface, SwingAdvancedControlInterface

    public abstract class AbstractControlInterface
extends java.lang.Object
implements ControlInterface
    Extend this class to add a custom control interface.

    IMPORTANT: You need to provide a corresponding constructor, see the one in this class.

    Author:
    Stefan Werner

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractControlInterface

        public AbstractControlInterface(ControlInterfaceConnector connector,
                                ComponentConfigurationController ciConfiguration,
                                LogConnector logConnector)
        Instantiates a new abstract control interface.

        IMPORTANT: Calling connector methods from constructor will raise an Exception, wait for startup() call instead.

        Parameters:
        connector - the connector
        ciConfiguration - the ci configuration
        logConnector - the log connector
